```{r}


if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages("BiocManager")

BiocManager::install("Gviz")
BiocManager::install("RCircos")
BiocManager::install("ComplexHeatmap")

# Example karyotype data (chromosome lengths)
chromosome_lengths <- c(249250621, 243199373, 198022430, 191154276, 180915260)

# Create a karyotype plot
plot(1:length(chromosome_lengths), chromosome_lengths, type = "h", ylim = c(0, max(chromosome_lengths)),
     xlab = "Chromosome", ylab = "Length", main = "Karyotype Plot")

```
